text: Brunellia acostae is a species of plant in the Brunelliaceae family. It is native to Ecuador, Panama, and Colombia.Kew World Checklist of Selected Plant FamiliesWorld Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Brunellia acostae. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.
